topic.title: 08chan
topic.body:
Content signing failed always. I grabbed the user cert from my zeroID and I still can't post.
What gives man?

1565638982_1Hb5zuymuNq9rhYhhoYuAPGMXpxsp.body: Of course it's a myth. Most people will never have enough money to start a business and even less people will ever get a job good enough to allow them to do so. It's just common sense.

> [theecollector](#comment_18_15rMfe5FVSWwMffJvTpBUq9dFiLQPNxkuU): So you dont think you could save up 500$?? Cuz thats the exact amount i started with... Now i make ~230,00$ per month! Here are some screenshot for you to see proof.https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmPqZpVheM4PQkbfGnbtqaDF4ni86vzxg34f4fmZDtekM1 [...]

Pure ideology; Majority of businesses (the ones that actually make you money) cost around 30k to start up.
Most people right now don't make 30k in America let alone globally.

This place was better before it was filled with Nazi sperg posters.

1565715792_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body: I'm running on my zeroid and it still is giving me a X > 0 error

> [nickwa](#comment_354_1EFZ3dYDWVpD4kF5H9PF83HjPAehEEKKJj): Probably because 08chan owner did not use the loophole I found to make content.json changes work for everyone.

How does I into content.json?

> [nickwa](#comment_355_1EFZ3dYDWVpD4kF5H9PF83HjPAehEEKKJj): You cant, it has to be the site owner.

fuck.

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_912_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): it should not if you really have zeroid active instead of 08chan id. (site menu - corner button dragged to the left, scroll down to identity. Upon changing identity, one have to reload page F5).For me zeroid ID works (it shows up on comment form). Yours mentioned message shows for me if i use 08chan identity that is not authorized. Once i switched to zeroid.bit identity and reloaded page, i was OK (publishing fine).

You're a god damn genius anon. 1MILLION KEKS TO YOU SIR!
